name: DreamPoints Slider by KRIS_IV
author: Krzysztof Kubiak

sections.description: This is customisable slider for DreamnPoints premium card. It’s available for everybody who is interested with this card. This plugin use only CSS3 for animation (not use JS).
sections.installation:
To install it automatically:

  1. Click ‘Install Now’.
  2. Click Activate the plugin

To install it part-manually:

  1. Download “dreampoints-slider.zip” from WordPress repository.
  2. Go to ‘Plugins’.
  3. Go to ‘Add new’.
  4. Chose ‘Upload’.
  5. Find “dreampoints-slider.zip” on your computer and click ‘Install Now’.

To install it manually:

  1. Download “Free-Quotation-by-KRIS_IV.zip” from WordPress repository.
  2. Unpack it.
  3. Upload “Free-Quotation-by-KRIS_IV” folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory by FTP client (f.ex. FileZilla).
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq: You can ask me on contact form on http://my-motivator.pl if you have any suggestion and question.
sections.changelog:
1.0.1

Small improvement (update CSS style for cooperate with some template).

1.0

This is initial relase of this plugin.
